```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)
library(data.table)
library(formattable)
library(gridExtra)
clean_survey <- read_csv("~/Documents/Trans_ED_Research/Trans ED Research/cleaned_survey.csv")
```
```{r, ED_BIN graphs}

ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=trans, fill = ED_BIN)) + geom_bar()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=trans_sort, fill = ED_BIN)) + geom_bar()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=sex, fill = ED_BIN)) + geom_bar()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=psych_BIN, fill = ED_BIN)) + geom_bar()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=ED_BIN, y=trans_score)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=ED_BIN, y=SO_score)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=ED_BIN, y=Fam_score)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=ED_BIN, y=Fri_score)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=ED_BIN, y=Total_score)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=ED_BIN, y=disc_score)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=ED_BIN, y=reject_score)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=ED_BIN, y=vict_score)) + geom_boxplot()
ggplot(clean_survey, aes(x=ED_BIN, y=years_to_trans)) + geom_boxplot()

```
